name: Los Inhumanos
storyline:
The action of this exciting game takes place in New York. The famous Central Park is the first stage where ZUFURU, our inhuman friend, is attacked by the Rockstones, who kidnap his partner, destroy his little Simca 1000 and, also, hide certain parts of the car, which our hero will have to find. as you go through the park. After completing this phase, you will go to the vicinity of the Empire State Building, where your loved one is. 
 
But first he will have to find the keys and a dagger to be able to enter to rescue her. 
 
I know that you will help him.
summary: A caveman themed, Spanish exclusive action game.
